content.question: At the end of the first paragraph, the author’s commentary regarding “[e]ach one of these treaties” (sentence 6) primarily serves to

choices.label: imply that such treaties will fail to accomplish their purpose if even one of them is violated
identify a set of criteria that must be satisfied before a goal described earlier in the paragraph can be accomplished
establish a logical relationship between the treaties he lists and a claim he makes earlier in the paragraph
articulate a key distinction between treaties that are likely to be effective and those that are likely to be broken

content.answer: establish a logical relationship between the treaties he lists and a claim he makes earlier in the paragraph

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and explain claims and evidence within an argument.
